enum.name: SyncVariants
enum.description: Represents the variants that are supported by the Secure Element to update the current date/time.

value.name: automaticSync
value.description: The time of the Secure Element is centrally managed or automatically adjusted and can not be adjusted via the API. This value shall be returned if the API function updateTime is not supported by the device.

value.name: manualSync
value.description: The time of the Secure Element can be set via the API.

value.name: automaticAndManualSync
value.description: The time of the Secure Element is centrally managed or automatically adjusted and can also be adjusted via the API.
